thread.title: Ross Miller

author: Ross Miller
title: Ross Miller
text: I had heard about THS from a friend who had used them, and was also very impressed with all the positive reviews on Trustpilot. Having done home exchanges before, we were open to the notion of strangers looking after our house, but we were still a little hesitant because of the dogs. Nevertheless we took the plunge and signed up. We couldn't be happier - customer service responded to an oversight on my part and quickly gave me a partial refund. The website is very easy to use and within hours of posting we found a wonderful couple (from 7 responses in one day!) to look after our home and pets. This is a life-changer for us, giving us a newfound ability to travel without the expense of a kennel and concern about how the dogs are doing in a strange environment. We have already arranged a second house sit and look forward to more.
